sentences.english: Objective Establish the quality standards for Jiere Xiaoyan Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高解熱消炎膠囊的質量標準。

sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 採用懸浮交聯法制備沙棘混合粉的微膠囊。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traditional Chinese medicine slimming capsule of the role of weight loss.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方中藥減肥膠囊的減肥作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the quality standard of Gegenbao Soft Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究葛根寶軟膠囊的質量控制標準。

sentences.english: Conclusion GKC is effective in treating chronic bronchitis in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 結論固本咳喘膠囊治療老年慢性支氣管炎療效確切。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The Tongbi capsule has inhibitory effect on acute and immune inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻膠囊具有對抗急性及免疫性炎症的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金剛藤軟膠囊中薯蕷皁苷元的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Children take 1 Good Health Bio-Active Bee Pollen capsule daily, in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 孩子每日上午1粒好健康生物活性蜂花粉膠囊。

sentences.english: People usually lose weight quite quickly when they take orlistat.
sentences.chinese: 服用奧利司他膠囊，減肥迅速。

sentences.english: Objective To establish quality standard for Compound Zhuanggu Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立複方壯骨膠囊質量標準。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Fule capsule treating chronic pelvic inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察婦樂膠囊對盆腔炎的療效。

sentences.english: Abstract:ObjeTo establish the qualitative identification methods of Ninxin Capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立寧心膠囊定性鑑別方法。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the biochemical mechanism of actions of Jiangguiyin capsules against myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究薑桂飲膠囊抗心肌缺血的生化機理。

sentences.english: We also offer tailor-made capsule according to client's formula.
sentences.chinese: 我們還提供度身定造膠囊根據客戶的公式。

sentences.english: Fuxinning Capsule is a safe and effective new drug of Chinese herbal medicine for VPC .
sentences.chinese: 復心寧膠囊是一種安全有效的治療室性早搏中藥新藥。

sentences.english: The third part, anti-inflammatory and analgesic effect study of PYJC.
sentences.chinese: 第三節，盆炎淨膠囊的抗炎與鎮痛作用研究。
